mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totalcnt, SUM(CASE WHEN REPLY NOT IN '답변대기' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) completecnt FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT U.USER_NAME, P.CONTENT, P.REPLY, P.CREATED_AT FROM USER_CLIENT U, (SELECT USER_NUM, CONTENT, REPLY, CREATED_AT FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, T.* FROM (SELECT * FROM QNA_BOARD WHERE CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) T) WHERE RNUM <= 3) P WHERE U.USER_NUM = P.USER_NUM

SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{todayStart} AND #{todayEnd} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS TODAY_CNT, SUM(CASE WHEN CREATED_AT BETWEEN #{monthStart} AND #{monthEnd} THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS MONTH_CNT FROM QNA_BOARD
